DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether or not there is enough information to determine disease response.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease Response Domain Sufficient Disease Response Information
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A domain for disease response evaluations._Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation._The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression._Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.

The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.
Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.
